title: Company logo very similar to "Eras Bold ITC"
content:
Please help me identify this font:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150413075132im_/http:/typophile.com/files/autogrow_5704.png)

Its used for our company logo and I need to create a similar one for an associated business.

It looks very similar to "Eras Bold ITC" but has a slight italic and some diagonal cuts on the stems etc.

Font: 

 Meta Black (Italic) 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150413075132/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
